title: Another client error
body:
was able to play lol games no problem a couple of days ago now every-time i open the client it displays error 0xc0000005 and will not open at first i was able to get into the client and even champion select adn it would display the error before loading screen after 4 hours of googling and  uninstalling and reinstalling 5 times it still shows the error i have allowed lol through firewall, tried disabling firewall and antivirus all together, used the repair tool 3 separate times, used cc cleaner, deleted the lol patcher folder, tried running as an administrator. tried running in compatibility mode, all my other games and programs run fine it is definitely the  LOL client that is broken looking for any solution that is not one of many that I have previously tried 

ive played this game since season 3 and it amazes me that the client is still so poor every patch comes with a new technical difficulty and ive probably had to fix 20 separate problems and it amazes me that it has not gotten any better in the last 5 years

heres my dxdaig info

replies.body:
Do you have more than one Firewall or Security Suite running when you try launching League? This error usually crops up if a Security program is blocking League from accessing specific files or making certain network connections. [**Performing a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) will ensure there aren't any problematic programs running in the background.

Please let me know if this helped.
